Needham Market Library is closed due to the coronavirus situation. More info on coronavirus and the library service →

Needham Market Library

Manager: Donna Grand

School Street, Needham Market
IP6 8BB

  • Tel: 01449 720780
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Friends group: Needham Market Town Council

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday Closed
Tuesday 1000 – 1300, 1400 - 1700
Wednesday 1400 – 1900
Thursday 1000 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Friday 1400 – 1700
Saturday 1000 - 1300, 1400 - 1700
Sunday 1100 – 1600

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: available; one space reserved for disabled customers
  • Out-of-hours book return available

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges
